biotools.summary: Tool for discovering motifs in a group of related DNA or protein sequences. A motif is a sequence pattern that occurs repeatedly in a group of related protein or DNA sequences. This tool represents motifs as position-dependent letter-probability matrices which describe the probability of each possible letter at each position in the pattern.

bioschemas.name: MEME
